name: Terminal illness
description:
This is Terminal Illness is a 2d Online Multiplayer Shooter in this Game You Play as Bacteria Spouses
Battle with Guns and Costumes in the Nervous System Play Against
Your Friends to Be The illness Using Power Ups or Just Pure Skills

Terminal Illness is a Online Multiplayer 2d Shooting game where You Play as Bacterial Spouses in the Nerviest System Where
You Battle to the Death To determine Who is The Illest With Guns and Powers Ups and Special and All themed With different
Stages and Kill Methods When the Times Up Whoever Has the Most Kills Will be Named the Illest Battle Against Your Friends in
a Online Multiplayer Brawl And Customize Your Player with a Wide Selections of add ons and Emotes But don't Worry if You
Don't have Friends Lie Me There's highly Intelligence Bots

On Start You can customize your characters and create your own Server or Join Others Matches As well Shoot Your Frenemies With Random Powerful
Weapons And Power Ups to Determine whos the illest in Your Squad by facing off in free for all Multiplayer Brawl
